item.description:
Christopher Columbus Park is a beautiful oasis for North End and Waterfront residents. Before Thanksgiving arrives, the central trellis is beautifully lit in blue for the entire winter. We will attend the lighting ceremony.
http://www.foccp.org/... Lights go on at 6:00. We'll be there from 5:45-6:30 and enjoy live entertainment, Legal's clam chowder, Starbucks hot chocolate and Mike's Pastry, all for free! At 6:30, we'll hit The Living Room, opposite the Park, for drinks and half-price appetizers. (until 7:00) http://thelivingroomb... Join us in the Park by the food tables until 6:30 or meet-up with us in The Living Room after 6:30. It should be a jolly evening.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'About' tab for further event guidelines. Thank you.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the food tables.
item.name: Holiday Trellis Lighting + Appetizers
